column4: How can I install kernel 3.0 rc7 on ubuntu 11.04? Do I have to manually download the .deb archives?
or can i just add the kernel ppa and install form there or?
i would advise against it, can't you wait for 11.10?
I just got a X220... and I want to run a 2560x1600 monitor over displayport.. afaik 3.0 fixes this
